headline: FirstEnergy Names Karen Sagot Vice President, Investor Relations, and Sean Davies Vice President, Continuous Improvement
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) announced today that Karen Sagot has been named Vice President, Investor Relations, effective Nov. 10, and Sean Davies has been named Vice President, Continuous Improvement, effective Nov. 18.
